mapper.select: SELECT tjm.pjt_addr_id , ( SELECT pjt_nm FROM t_pjt WHERE pjt_addr_id = tjm.pjt_addr_id ) AS pjt_nm , tjm.tmpl_group , tjm.job_mst_cd , tjm.job_mst_nm , ( SELECT user_nm FROM t_user WHERE user_id = tjm.crer_id ) AS crer_user_name , DATE_FORMAT(tjm.cre_ymdt, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS cre_ymdt FROM t_job_mst tjm WHERE tjm.job_mst_uprcd is null AND tjm.pjt_addr_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY tjm.tmpl_group DESC

SELECT job.pjt_addr_id AS projectAddressId , job.seq AS sequence , job.job_mst_cd AS jobMasterCode , job.job_mst_uprcd AS jobMasterUppderCode , job.job_mst_nm AS masterTemplateName , job.job_ver_nm AS versionTemplateName , ( SELECT comm_cd_nm FROM t_comm_cd WHERE comm_cd = job.job_status ) AS jobStatus , job.job_tc_cnt AS testCaseCount , ( SELECT user_nm FROM t_user WHERE user_id = job.crer_id ) AS creatorName , DATE_FORMAT(job.cre_ymdt,'%y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS createdDate FROM ( SELECT tjs.* , (CASE @jobnm WHEN tjs.job_mst_uprcd THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@jobnm:=tjs.job_mst_uprcd) vnm FROM t_job_mst tjs , (SELECT @jobnm:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE tjs.job_mst_uprcd != "" AND tjs.pjt_addr_id = #{projectAddressId} AND job_mst_uprcd = #{jobMasterUppderCode} ORDER BY tmpl_group DESC , cre_ymdt DESC ) job WHERE job.rnum <=3

SELECT tjm.pjt_addr_id AS projectAddressId , ( SELECT pjt_nm FROM t_pjt WHERE pjt_addr_id = tjm.pjt_addr_id ) AS projectName , tjm.seq AS sequence , tjm.job_mst_cd AS jobMasterCode , tjm.tmpl_group AS templateGroup , tjm.job_mst_nm AS masterTemplateName , tjm.job_ver_nm AS versionTemplateName , tjm.job_tc_cnt AS testCaseCount , ( SELECT comm_cd_nm FROM t_comm_cd WHERE comm_cd = tjm.job_status ) AS jobStatus , ( SELECT user_nm FROM t_user WHERE user_id = tjm.crer_id ) AS creatorName , DATE_FORMAT(tjm.cre_ymdt, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS createdDate , ( SELECT user_nm FROM t_user WHERE user_id = tjm.modr_id ) AS modifyerName , DATE_FORMAT(tjm.mod_ymdt, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS modifyedDate FROM t_job_mst tjm WHERE tjm.pjt_addr_id = #{projectAddressId} AND tjm.job_mst_uprcd = #{jobMasterUppderCode} ORDER BY tjm.seq DESC;
